column6: Nippon Yusen Kabushiki Kaisha (NYK Line) provides ocean, land, and air transportation services. Nippon Yusen Kabushiki Kaisha was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Punto Fa manufactures and sells clothing and accessories. It offers its products through its subsidiary Mango, a chain of stores in Spain and internationally. The company was established in 1984 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

ONYX Hospitality Group is a leading hotel management company that combines the expertise of a truly global executive team with the hospitality excellence for which Asia is renowned. ONYX offers a wide portfolio of hospitality brands, including the luxury Saffron portfolio, the market-leading Amari brand of hotels and resorts, Shama serviced apartments, and the all-new select service OZO. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Wimbledon School of English is an English language school based in London, United Kingdom. The firm offers a wide range of English language courses in various fields such as medicine and business. The firm was established in 1964.

China Tower Corporation Limited operates as a telecommunication company. The company provides telecommunication towers construction, towers maintenance, ancillary facilities management, and other services. China Tower provides its services throughout China. The firm was founded in 2014 and is based in Beijing, China.
column38: China Tower Corporation, Crick Laos Market Consulting

column6: Fast Retailing is an apparel retailer that operates Uniqlo and other brands. The company was formerly known as Ogori Shoji and changed its name to Fast Retailing in September 1991. Fast Retailing is based in Yamaguchi, Japan, and was founded in 1949.

column4: Sun Paper (Shan Dong Sun Paper Industry)
column5: Sun Paper (Shan Dong Sun Paper Industry)
column6: Sun Paper (Shan Dong Sun Paper Industry) produces and distributes paper and paperboard. The company's major products include coated paperboard, raw paper, and fine paper used in office environment. The company is based in Yanzhou, China.
Nippon Express, through its subsidiaries, provides logistics services. The company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
Nippon Express, through its subsidiaries, provides logistics services. The company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

New World Development, an investment holding company, invests in, develops, and manages properties in Hong Kong, China, and internationally. Its property portfolio comprises residential estates, office buildings, shopping centres, convention centres, hotels, service apartments, and convention centres. The company is also involved in contracting activities; provision of property and facility management, transport, and other services. Further, the company is engaged in general trading, construction and civil engineering, building construction, consumer products retail, estate agency, marketing and promotion, property agency management and consultancy, liquor and tobacco sale, carpark management, piling and ground investigation, land development, bond issuing, and financing activities, as well as in foundation works. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.

Electricity Generating Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity to government sector and industrial users primarily in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. It operates in two segments, Electricity Generation and Other Businesses. The company generates electricity from various resources, such as natural gas, coal, biomass, waste, hydro, solar, wind, and geothermal. It operates 24 operating power plants with total equity contracted capacity of 4121 MW in 5 countries in the Asia Pacific region; and has 6 projects under construction and development with total equity contracted capacity of 869 MW. The company also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

It operates in two segments, Electricity Generation and Other Businesses. The company generates electricity from various resources, such as natural gas, coal, biomass, waste, hydro, solar, wind, and geothermal. The company also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

Robert Bosch is an engineering and technology company. Its remit includes consumer goods, energy and building technology, and automotive technology. Robert Bosch was established in 1886 and is headquartered in Stuttgart, Germany.
column36: Martin Hayes, president (south-east Asia) "we have seen tremendous growth potential in the country and have experienced success in engaging local customers and business,"

column6: Toong operates co-working spaces throughout Vietnam and it also has a presence in Laos and Cambodia. The firm was founded in 2015 and is based in Ha Noi, Vietnam.

United Motor Works (Siam) Public Company Limited imports and distributes automotive service equipment. The company is the sole distributor of Briggs and Stratton diesel generator from the United States and "McKay" plough disc from Australia. The firm is based in Bangkok, Thailand and was founded in 1947.

Minor International, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a hospitality and leisure company. The company operates through four segments: Hotel & Spa, Mixed Use, Restaurant, and Retail. As of February 20, 2014, it had approximately 1500 restaurants under The Pizza Company, Swensen's, Sizzler, Dairy Queen, Burger King, Thai Express, The Coffee Club, Ribs and Rumps, and Riverside brands in 19 countries. The company also invested in, owns, and operates a portfolio of 103 hotels and serviced suites under the Anantara, AVANI, Oaks, Per AQUUM, Marriott, Four Seasons, St. Regis, Elewana, and Minor International brands. Minor International was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

Vietnam Dairy Products provides milk and dairy products in Vietnam and internationally. It processes, manufactures, and distributes milk cake, soya milk, fresh milk, refreshment drinks, bottled milk, powdered milk, nutritious powder, and other milk products. The company also offers yogurt, condensed milk, ice-cream, and cheese, as well as beverages, such as fruit juices, aloe vera drinks, bottled drinking water, salty lemonade, and tea. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam.
